hero.title: ONE KEY
hero.subtitle: VERIFY-PAY-VIBE
hero.description: Your Adaptive AI Profile For The New Real World. Signal Your Flow. Instantly Switch Your Identity To Control Your Social Presence, Payments, And Total Invisibility.
hero.headline: ONE KEY.
hero.switchIdentity: Instantly Switch Your Identity To Control Your Social Presence, Payments, And Total Invisibility.
hero.instantEntryDesc: One touch, no friction. Use your verified ID for immediate, seamless access to any VALID portal, venue, or event worldwide.
hero.secureFundsDesc: Load once and pay instantly with your Ghost™ Token. Funds are segregated and fully insured for total payment peace of mind.
hero.dataLockDesc: Your health, payment details, and personal ID are tokenized and invisible. Share only a single, anonymous clearance (e.g., 21+ Verified) when required.

secureFunds.title: Your Funds. Secure & Fast.
secureFunds.description: Load once and pay instantly with your Ghost™ Token. Funds are segregated and fully insured for total payment peace of mind.

dataLock.title: Total Data Lock
dataLock.description: Your health, payment details, and personal ID are tokenized and invisible. Share only a single, anonymous clearance when required.

network.title: THE VALID NETWORK
network.headline: ONE IDENTITY. ZERO LIMITS.
network.description: Static profiles are ancient. Now you choose what you share. Points of entry are fluid. You lock down your Vitals for Invisibility, or open your profile for that Connection. Your identity is now adaptable, secure, and entirely under your control.
network.descriptionB2b: Members toggle between modes based on context—each mode reveals only what's relevant. Operations see the right verification signal without accessing private data.

standard.title: STANDARD VIBE-ID
standard.description: Instant club entry, P2P connection, and all domestic use cases.

vip.title: VIP GLOBAL ACCESS
vip.description: International transactions, crypto-KYC, and premium travel utility.

footer.disclaimerText: Valid™ is a technology platform, not a healthcare provider. Services are for informational purposes only. All testing by independent CLIA-certified labs. HIPAA-compliant. We do not sell PHI.
footer.legalNoticeText: The Valid™ platform, the Ghost™ privacy architecture, and all associated methodologies, algorithms, and interface designs are the exclusive Intellectual Property of Valid™. These concepts are protected by Common Law Trademark rights and pending patent filings. By accessing this platform, you acknowledge that you are viewing confidential, proprietary information. Any unauthorized copying, reverse engineering, or reproduction of the Valid™ or Ghost™ concepts will be prosecuted. This site is for authorized demonstration purposes only.

standard.title: THE VALID™
standard.subtitle: Designed for humans, not data points.
standard.militaryFortressAlt: Military-Grade Fortress - Digital Fortress enabled. Unbreachable zero-trust encryption. Your identity is locked.
standard.acceptedAnywhereDesc: One Key. Universal Acceptance at Any VALID Portal. Skip the manual check Points of Entry, Airports, Entertainment Venues, Public Agencies, and Corporate Zones Worldwide.
standard.yourDataAlt: Your Data. Your Rules. Ghost Protocol Enabled. Context-aware sharing.
standard.instantFinancialDesc: Frictionless Fund Flow. Load once, spend anywhere. Tap-to-Pay instantly at any POS using your Ghost™ Token. Secure funds held in a segregated FBO vault. Zero transaction fees, zero chargebacks. Your liquidity moves at the speed of light.

cta.accessPlatform: Access the full platform, create your profile, and get verified.
